content.data:
[Y]CRTC Registers and Timing
[W]Geometry from register values.
[c][m.]
[W]CRTC registers control horizontal and
[W]vertical totals, displayed regions and
[W]start addresses.
[W]Different CRTC variants can differ in
[W]edge behaviour, so testing across
[W]hardware matters.
[c][m.]
[G]- R0/R1 shape line timing.
[G]- R12/R13 set start address.
[G]- Variant quirks are real.
[m][m-]
[Y]DID YOU KNOW?
[C]Minor register shifts can create major
[C]visual changes.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
